bibl.title: Dress Accessories from Antinoupolis. Finds from the Northern Necropolis.
bibl.note: Shows the variety of dress accessories [headgear, hairnet, hood, cap, etc., Late Antique and Early Christian period] discovered in 2007 in the 'peristyle complex' by an international team under the leadership of Rosario Pintaudi. - 1. Introduction. - 2. Catalogue. - 3. Conclusions.

bibl.title: assisted by Elisabeth Ehler, Dress Accessories of the 1st Millennium AD from Egypt. Proceedings of the 6th Conference of the Research Group 'Textiles from the Nile Valley', Antwerp, 2-3 October 2009.

bibl.seg: Fluck Cäcilia and Harald Froschauer, Dress Accessories from Antinoupolis. Finds from the Northern Necropolis.

Antoine De Moor and Cäcilia Fluck (Edd.), assisted by Elisabeth Ehler, Dress Accessories of the 1st Millennium AD from Egypt. Proceedings of the 6th Conference of the Research Group 'Textiles from the Nile Valley', Antwerp, 2-3 October 2009 (Tielt, 2011) pp. 54-69, 19 figg. coul.

Shows the variety of dress accessories [headgear, hairnet, hood, cap, etc., Late Antique and Early Christian period] discovered in 2007 in the 'peristyle complex' by an international team under the leadership of Rosario Pintaudi. - 1. Introduction. - 2. Catalogue. - 3. Conclusions.
